body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/VKnxp3xpXMOlcHodOeL8uraP43US3io8v1WeizeVHFAIVfMXae5QasLg9grlmaAaRyafafcniSKCrBLGbIIYP1V5NQ-AXAuc/Capture.PNG) Hello everyone! I am new to Ladybug and trying to use it to get the solar envelope. I followed the example file however I end up like this. Could someone help? Thank! K

replies.body:
Hi,

You're providing sunAltitudes instead of sunVectors

sorry i m not here to solve problem perhaps i bring more problem. I tried your file, but i updated the version using 0.64 which is the newest version but popup message asked to use new version of LB, but i cant get newer than this. can I get some help please.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/phdCK*jNYvEYSzWO1eSdqnk9CvcUhpDed17Iw97FxF3G7lVdSnmIRQ*sa5E3pvTASTURp7Cb6JUE2IbuGYNxY4xjvBHFTuM2/123.JPG)
here are 2 files i m having trouble with

All of your files are missing the geometry. Please internalize.

Kang: The second file is a mess with such amount of importEPW and sunPath components inserted and chained.

-A.

hi Guys. i had a go with very simple surrounding and it kind of worked, but once i tested with a project the result seems wrong cas my max height is at 450M and the "Separate by Normal" had issue. there should be a result of 2 srfs with solar envelope & collection. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/00SS2erZpW3wZ90xQKP3BDO3s*0E432mGKEVPdDj3GDC0j3oszpcJrCeYTInS5eVciLmuj0p8UDWXF2N78dVV95eZbNBLQdL/17052201.JPG)

The rhino file is not recognized. Try to internalise the geometry. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1P3zk9nRU2DQh8G5R4xHTRtqiccDyonKPKPkucz8t5PDkettyReBwdIzusYioNeBelwgNxZz20AdlUBvFFqKj5eIjpUZNPMv/Capture.JPG) -A.

Hi A thanks for helping, I realize that inserting context volume it will not recognize polysurface but its fine with box extrusions. so the problems are 1st; if context massing needs to be more exact then the component fail to read. 2nd; not all the context requires max solar hours. for example requirement for commercial is low, for residential would be 3 hr during winters. so instead i used solar hours analysis in LB to simulate a Massing from rhino to do the task for now. but if these can combined than it should able to simulate Max of air right envelope. [
](http://api.ning.com:80/files/7vd*I4uYJz0-iN*iyQLJXnJtzHXDIFVaJ4xr3-urzTZb7KJ*7np0Yb2l*WEZOw0Gm9Lf5sObwh3XNr1IYDoISZ3XYXEmdyZZ/17060401.JPG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/7vd*I4uYJz0B9p42bPykfH9kYtdX*Mc2Cez2xihukvP7AUbPTRWJ7-cnxnpqC*zn-cIObPNDWxWBWaMkLpsf3jsTRF34PSfd/17060402.JPG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/7vd*I4uYJz0-iN*iyQLJXnJtzHXDIFVaJ4xr3-urzTZb7KJ*7np0Yb2l*WEZOw0Gm9Lf5sObwh3XNr1IYDoISZ3XYXEmdyZZ/17060401.JPG)
